arcade.potts.sim.hamiltonian

Class SurfaceHamiltonian

  • java.lang.Object
    • arcade.potts.sim.hamiltonian.SurfaceHamiltonian
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Hamiltonian
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    SurfaceHamiltonian2D, SurfaceHamiltonian3D

    public abstract class SurfaceHamiltonian
extends java.lang.Object
implements Hamiltonian
    Implementation of Hamiltonian for surface energy.

      • getDelta

        public double getDelta(int sourceID,
                       int targetID,
                       int x,
                       int y,
                       int z)
        Gets change in energy.

        Surface energy is calculated by taking the difference in target and proposed surface for the given ID. Change in surface energy is taken as the difference in differences of surface energies for the source and target IDs when a voxel is removed or added.

        Specified by:
        getDelta in interface Hamiltonian
        Parameters:
        sourceID - the id of the source voxel
        targetID - the id of the target voxel
        x - the x coordinate
        y - the y coordinate
        z - the z coordinate
        Returns:
        the change in energy

      • getDelta

        public double getDelta(int id,
                       int sourceRegion,
                       int targetRegion,
                       int x,
                       int y,
                       int z)
        Gets change in energy for region.

        Surface energy is calculated by taking the difference in target and proposed surface for the given region. Change in surface energy is taken as the difference in differences of surface energies for the source and target regions when a voxel is removed or added.

        Specified by:
        getDelta in interface Hamiltonian
        Parameters:
        id - the voxel id
        sourceRegion - the region of the source voxel
        targetRegion - the region of the source voxel
        x - the x coordinate
        y - the y coordinate
        z - the z coordinate
        Returns:
        the change in energy

      • getSurface

        double getSurface(int id,
                  int change)
        Gets the surface energy for a given change in surface.
        Parameters:
        id - the voxel id
        change - the change in surface
        Returns:
        the energy

                  int t,

        Gets the surface energy for a given change in surface for region.
